overview: As CFO of T3Media, Eric Toler is responsible for all financial operations of the company, including financing, reporting and accounting. Eric has over seventeen years of business consulting and executive leadership experience with technology-based companies. Prior to T3Media, Eric was Executive Vice President and CFO of Carefx Corporation, a venture-backed provider of enterprise software for the Healthcare market. Prior to Carefx, Eric was CFO of Core3, Inc., a Business Process Outsourcing provider with operations in India and the U.S. Before his operating roles, he was a venture capitalist with Koch Ventures, the private equity and venture capital arm of the largest private company in the U.S., Koch Industries. Eric has an MBA from the University of Michigan and did his undergraduate work at Dartmouth College.
